nodes.label: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Forest habitat with trees, bushes, birds, and a squirrel
Pond habitat with water, fish, clams, and water plants
Correctly displays land habitat with various living things
Correctly displays water habitat with aquatic life
Difference between land and water habitat correctly shown through trees vs. water
Labels some living things but lacks label precision and detail
Improve labeling accuracy by including names for more organisms
